Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@
+const mysql = require("mysql2");
+
+// 1.创建连接池
+const connectionPool = mysql.createPool({
+  host: "localhost",
+  port: "3306",
+  database: "coderhub",
+  user: "root",
+  password: "Codery123@",
+  connectionLimit: 5,
+});
+
+
+
+
+
+// 3.获取连接池中连接对象(promise)
+const connection = connectionPool.promise();
+
+
+
+
+module.exports = connection;
